Keywords: Illuminati , Politician , Quiet Council , Ruler , Starjammers , X-Force , X-Men
Real Name: Charles Xavier
Team Up
01
TEAM UP: MAGNETO: If both Professor X and the listed friendly character are on the map, they have PROTECTED: Pulse Wave. (After revealing forces, you may replace character cards with their alternates. You can't choose a Team Up if your starting characters share a name.)
02
TEAM UP: MAGNETO: If both Professor X and the listed friendly character are on the map, they can use [Colossal symbol], Impervious, and modify their combat values +1 when they have two action tokens. (After revealing forces, you may replace character cards with their alternates. You can't choose a Team Up if your starting characters share a name.)
03
TEAM UP: CALLISTO, KARIMA, MAGNETO: If a listed friendly character is adjacent to Professor X, they both have PROTECTED: Outwit. (After revealing forces, you may replace character cards with their alternates. You can't choose a Team Up if your starting characters share a name.)
04
TEAM UP: ILLUMINATI THEMED TEAM: [After establishing themed teams, if Professor X is part of a listed theme team, you may use the following effect:] If 1+ friendly characters with the Illuminati keyword are on the map, equipped opposing characters can�t have their combat values positively modified. (After revealing forces, you may replace character cards with their alternates. You can�t choose a Team Up if your starting characters share a name).
Special Powers
KRAKOAN REVIVAL: For all characters with this trait, when a friendly standard character with the X-Men keyword and a lower point value would be KO'd by an opposing effect, you may instead choose to turn that character to it's starting click (this game) and place them adjacent to a friendly character that can use this trait. If you do, your opponent scores that character and generates a bystander on this card (of their choice) adjacent to any of their characters. Your opponent then scores 10 points for every bystander they generated this game via this trait, regardless of source.
BARTERING PHARMACEUTICAL BREAKTHROUGHS FOR KRAKOAN SOVEREIGNTY: FREE: Choose an opposing character not on its starting click. That character's controller may heal that character 1 click. If they do, until your next turn the chosen character can't attack. If they don't, roll a d6. 3-6: Heal 1 click on a friendly character that is equal or less points than the chosen character.
WHILE YOU SLEPT, THE WORLD CHANGED: Mind Control, Stealth. When Professor X uses Mind Control he has [Improved Targeting: Elevated, Hindering, Characters. This character can make range attacks while adjacent to opposing characters. (May target adjacent or non-adjacent opposing characters.)]
Trade Professor X Want Professor X

May 6, 2021
muel0017
I was lucky enough to get this guy, his team up card TEAM UP: MAGNETO, and the Magneto from this set. I've played Mags at 90pts both times when paired with this guy and neither of them have ever been ko'd. While as a stand alone figure he is pretty good, he really shines when teamed with Magneto and they both get the Team Up bonus.
